definitions.definition: Any of a genre of computer role playing games loosely characterized by various characteristics such as randomised environment generation , permadeath , turn -based movement, text -based or primitive tile -based graphics, and hack-and-slash gameplay .

main_definition: ( video games ) Any of a genre of computer role playing games loosely characterized by various characteristics such as randomised environment generation , permadeath , turn -based movement, text -based or primitive tile -based graphics, and hack-and-slash gameplay .
